author: _kirag_
content:
I'm trying to get involved in 4844 development with absolutely zero knowledge of how the RPC connections to blockchains work.

so, should I be able to do this? 

./blob-utils tx -rpc-url https://eip-4844.optimism.io/ip4/34.171.161.213/tcp/13000/p2p/16Uiu2HAm3fx3hL8EEzu4rvW2y74FFcgq3nFoU5Dau1JdpS2JHF9W  -blob-file ~/Downloads/33870a53-9ef2-452b-bd5c-8acd7b37e44b.csv -to <address_removed> -value 0x2 -private-key <privatekey_removed>


I get a nonce error, when I run the above command :
2022/10/12 12:26:53 Error getting nonce: 404 Not Found: 404 page not found
